definition: non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])

sentences.english: Once cooked, add the remainder of the coriander.
sentences.chinese: 熟了以后，再加入剩馀的胡荽菜。

sentences.english: Cilantro is a very fast growing herb which can be grown just about anywhere.
sentences.chinese: 胡荽叶是一个非常快速成长的药草可以种植任何地方。

sentences.english: This can be accomplished by taking an optimal dose of Cilantro tablet.
sentences.chinese: 通常同时伴以服用最适量的胡荽叶锭剂就可以达到。

sentences.english: It is always best to harvest Cilantro before it bolts or blooms.
sentences.chinese: 它始终是最好的收获胡荽叶收到螺栓或开花。

sentences.english: Coriander and cilantro are the same spice.
sentences.chinese: 胡荽和胡荽叶是同一种香料。

sentences.english: Coriander and cilantro are the same spice.
sentences.chinese: 胡荽和胡荽叶是同一种香料。

sentences.english: They teach us many tricks with mushrooms and coriander.
sentences.chinese: 他们教给我们很多关于蘑菇和胡荽的小窍门。

definition: schizonepeta, herb used in Chinese medicine
Umbelliferae or Apiaceae, plant family containing carrot, coriander etc
